title: Applicant name
question: What is your full name?
content1: The name you give us will be written on the grant of probate.
content2: Your name should match exactly what is written on your passport or other official identification document, such as a driving licence.
content3: You should make sure that this is the same form of identification you use when you are dealing with {deceasedName}'s estate.
firstName: First name and any middle names
warningText: If the name on the grant does not match the identification you use, you may have difficulties dealing with the estate.

firstName.required: Enter your first name and any middle names
firstName.minLength: First name must be 2 characters or more
firstName.maxLength: First name must be 100 characters or less
firstName.invalid: First name must only include letters a to z, and special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes

lastName.length: Last name must be 2 characters or more
lastName.maxLength: Last name must be 100 characters or less
lastName.invalid: Last name must only include letters a to z, and special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes
